description: Tag an Amazon Bedrock Data Automation resource.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: List of tags (dict) --- Key value pair of a tag Defines the context of the tag. Defines the value within the context. e.g. <key=reason, value=training>.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: Defines the context of the tag.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: Defines the value within the context. e.g. <key=reason, value=training>.
